column4: i just saw your post   what is the hardware configuration of your system?
i have a dual core, with gma 950 and 1g of ram
ok and what was the issue with compiz fusion?
compiz used to work out of the box but recently it has disappeared and i cannot reenable it
i guess due to some system updates
mm well the hardware can handle it for sure   I am curious which system updates may have caused this to fail
how did you uninstall compiz fusion?
i went to synaptic and remove every compiz-related packages
well actually all you really had to do was go to system/preferences/appearacne/visual effects and select "None" to shut it down

lol, in fact it got done automatically, anyway, i'll reboot the system now. the thing is i was trying to upload around 100mb of pics to Flickr and Firefox just hung, though the upload process was still runing
no harm in reinstalling it and if you do  also include compizconfig-settings-manager  open that with ccsm   then
then  just above the "Close" button is preferences  if compiz fusion is again not working  hit the reset to default button and change the backend to flat-file to see if that fixes anything
has anyone also tried the new bitdefender for unices, it scanned the same proc/task folder for almost 2 hours, funny AV
also since you have intel I would stop in at #compiz-fusion and speak with crdlb about this
